<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Fixing the message when no topic is published</description>
        <name>Fix No Topic Found Message</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var _page = new GlideRecord("sys_cs_adapter_configuration_page");
_page.query();
while (_page.next()) {
	var client_type = _page.client_type;
	if (client_type == 'workplace')
		client_type = 'facebook';
	var configStr = new sn_cs_adapter.AdapterConfigGenerator().getDefaultConfig(client_type);
	var defaultConfig = JSON.parse(configStr);
	var adapter_config = new GlideRecord("sys_cs_adapter_configuration");
	adapter_config.addQuery("sys_cs_adapter_configuration_page", _page.sys_id);
	adapter_config.query();
	
	while (adapter_config.next()) {
		var name = adapter_config.attribute_name.trim();
		var value = adapter_config.attribute_value.trim();
		if((name.equals("no_active_topic_found_msg") && value.equals("Hi %s, I'm not ready for any requests yet.")))
		{
			adapter_config.attribute_value=defaultConfig[name];
		}
		adapter_config.update();
	}

	
}]]></script>
